Module softeng.gc30
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable
The Board class represents the living room of the game.

    • putTile

      public void putTile(Tile tile, int[] coordinates)
      Places a tile on the board at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      tile - the tile to be placed
      coordinates - the coordinates where the tile should be placed

    • getSize

      public int getSize()

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile(int x, int y)
      Retrieves the tile at the specified coordinates on the game board.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the tile
      y - the y-coordinate of the tile
      Returns:
      the tile at the specified coordinates

    • checkRefill

      public boolean checkRefill()
      Checks the tiles on the board and determines if there are any empty spaces or gaps that need to be filled. It returns true if the board needs to be refilled, indicating that there are no adjacent tiles of non-transparent color, and false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if the board needs to be refilled, false otherwise

    • setBorderTiles

      public void setBorderTiles()
      Sets the border tiles of the game board. The border tiles are the available tiles that can be popped during a turn by a player from the board during gameplay. They are filtered based on the player's choices during their turn

    • getBorderTiles

      public List<int[]> getBorderTiles()
      Returns the list of border tiles.
      Returns:
      The list of border tiles, which are the available tiles on the board during gameplay.

    • getAvailableTiles

      public List<int[]> getAvailableTiles()
      Returns the list of available tiles. They are tiles that have at least one empty adjacent empty cell or transparent tile.
      Returns:
      The list of available tiles.

    • filterAvailableTiles

      public List<int[]> filterAvailableTiles(int[] chosenTile1, int[] chosenTile2, List<int[]> borderTiles)
      Filters the available tiles based on the tiles chosen by the player and the border tiles of that turn.
      Parameters:
      chosenTile1 - The first chosen tile.
      chosenTile2 - The second chosen tile.
      borderTiles - The list of border tiles.
      Returns:
      The list of filtered available tiles.

    • popTile

      public Tile popTile(int x, int y)
      Pops the tile at the specified position (x, y) from the board. Assigns a new Tile object with null color to the corresponding position in the board
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the tile.
      y - The y-coordinate of the tile.
      Returns:
      The tile that was popped from the board.

    • fillBoard

      public void fillBoard(Bag bag)
      Fills the empty tiles on the board with tiles from the provided bag.
      Parameters:
      bag - The bag from which to draw tiles.
